steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
Place the cursor at the location where you want to create the bulleted list outline.
Click on the 'Bullets' button in the 'Paragraph' group.
Type the first item of the bulleted list and press 'Enter' to create a new bullet point.
Repeat the previous step for each item of the bulleted list.
To end the bulleted list, press 'Enter' twice.
